title: Sample Simple Module
description: Test module with overly simple content

blocks.content: It is fun. You can do it. Go in. Say hi. Be nice. Smile. Sit up. Look up. Act cool.
Do good. Be smart. Try hard. Win. Get it. Yes. You can. Go go go.
Be on time. Say yes. Nod. Smile a lot.
Do it now. Go for it. Try it out. Have fun. Win big.
